DOC.brief_summary: The study compare one technique fluid administration ( combine colloid preload crystalloid colaod ) another one ( crystalloid coload ) elective cesarean delivery perform spinal anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Colloid Preload And Crystalloid Coload Versus Crystalloid Coload During Spinal Anesthesia Cesarean Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control , double-blind study conduct ASA physical status II parturients full-term singleton pregnancy undergo elective cesarean delivery spinal anesthesia . Participants receive either 500 mL colloid preload 500 mL crystalloid coload ( Combination group ) 1000 mL crystalloid coload ( Coload group ) . Systolic blood pressure record every minute ephedrine administer hypotension occur accord predefined protocol . The total ephedrine dose , time first ephedrine dose , heart rate , inferior vena cava diameter , nausea/vomiting , neonatal Apgar score record .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists physical status II parturients Full term , singleton pregnancy Elective cesarean delivery spinal anesthesia Age < 19 > 40 year Height < 150 cm Weight < 60 kg Body mass index â‰¥40 kg/m2 Contraindications spinal anesthesia ( increase intracranial pressure , coagulopathy , local skin infection ) Chronic pregnancyinduced hypertension Hemoglobin < 10 gm/dL . Diabetes mellitus , cardiovascular , cerebrovascular , renal disease Polyhydramnios know fetal abnormality
